products.title: Perfect Fit Hive Plain White Duo Thermal Blind
products.description: Hive blinds have a unique honeycomb structure, which not only offer light control but are also energy saving. They can regulate room temperature by helping to reduce heat loss in winter and help keep rooms cool in summer. Perfect fit hive plain white duo thermal blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Marble White Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their marble white - a contemporary take on a traditional neutral tone.
